description: This file defines the route handlers for managing 'notes' in a RESTful API built with Express.js. It sets up endpoints for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting notes, with Swagger annotations for API documentation. The file references a notesController for business logic and exports an Express router.

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: TypeScript or JavaScript method for defining a GET HTTP route for listing notes, bound to notesController.list.

methods.name: router.get('/:id')
methods.description: Defines a GET route for fetching a specific note by ID, bound to notesController.get.

methods.name: router.post('/')
methods.description: Defines a POST route for creating a new note, bound to notesController.create.

methods.name: router.put('/:id')
methods.description: Defines a PUT route for updating an existing note by ID, bound to notesController.update.

methods.name: router.delete('/:id')
methods.description: Defines a DELETE route for deleting a note by ID, bound to notesController.delete.
